content.p: Knowing how to sell your product or services is often one of the hardest parts of making your business a success. Join Graham for this Sales Masterclass, where he will teach you a method and some practical skills that, when applied, will help you have more relaxed and professional selling discussions with your potential customers. No gimicks, no pushy techniques but instead a normal human to human interaction with a structure that will get you to where you need to be. Jubilee Campus Nottingham NG8 1BB Email: ingenuitylab@nottingham.ac.uk
